import data from "../data/data"; import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; function ProductView(props) { useEffect(() => { const selectedProduct = data.product.find( (i) => i.Id === props.match.params.id ); }, []); return (

{selectedProduct.name}



Ürün Kodu: {selectedProduct.code}



Adet Fiyatı: {selectedProduct.lastPrice} TL



İndirimli Adet Fiyatı: {selectedProduct.price} TL


); } export default ProductView;
